title: Number game – Experience of a European research infrastructure (CLARIN) for the analysis of web traffic

author: Go Sugimoto, Austrian Academy of Sciences

I must say becausw.

Strong.

I also recommend to do more promotion and campaigns and communication strategically.

Thank you very much for your attention.
